conclusion: In general, when the light source shifts to the right (keeping roughly the same height), every shadow cast on the ground slides leftward (opposite the lightâ€™s motion).
Shadows also lengthen or shorten depending on whether the light moves closer or farther in the horizontal sense to each object.

premise: The light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Shadow A (from the birdcage) moves leftward and a little rearward.

premise: The light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Shadow A's outline remains much the same shape but becomes slightly longer because the effective horizontal distance from light to object increases.

premise: The light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Shadow B (from the glass/transparent part) shifts left even more noticeably than A, because the object is farther right to begin with.

premise: The light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Shadow B's thin 'handle' portion also lengthens, so the whole shadow looks slightly larger.

premise: The light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Shadow C (from the drumstick) slides left.

premise: The light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Because the drumstick sits lower, the relative change in light-to-object angle is less dramatic, so the size grows only modestly compared with A and B.

premise: Summarising positions and sizes after the lamp moves right.
conclusion: A: farther left, a bit behind its original spot, slightly larger.

premise: Summarising positions and sizes after the lamp moves right.
conclusion: B: much farther left, larger and a little stretched.

premise: Summarising positions and sizes after the lamp moves right.
conclusion: C: leftward shift comparable to the other two but modest increase in size.

premise: After the light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Shadow A shifts left and becomes a little larger.

premise: After the light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Shadow B shifts farther left than A and becomes noticeably longer/larger.

premise: After the light source shifts to the right.
conclusion: Shadow C also moves left, with only a slight increase in size.
